overview: The Other Side is a twenty minute video examining the issues that people face when someone close to them has had a stroke. Five different caregivers talk about the issues and emotional decisions they had to make, their struggles and their triumphs. A short but intimate film which strikes a chord with anyone who has faced this challenge. This provocative piece reveals the highest of the highs and the lowest of the lows but the final compassionate message it delivers is one of hope.
title: The Other Side
